subject: Re: Shipping update for order #SSN5770
description_text:
Hello, I paid for 5 days delivery and was expecting to redo the package
today, however it say it will be delivered on the 13th. I would like to get
a refund for expedited shipping which was delayed on your end.

Thanks for your help

conversations.body_text:
Is anyone working at this company or I need to do bank dispute?

I heard your customer service sucks, but not to even respond it’s
ridiculous.

I received pedals 3 days late and haptic feedback was not included. Where
is it? I paid extra for it and it was not shipped at all.

If I don’t get a response within the next 24 hours I’m doing bank dispute
for the full amount and we will go from there.

Thank you
Vadim
I’ll be opening despite with my bank by the end of the day

Hi Vadim Spasiuk,     Due to demand far exceeding expectations, this item has been out of stock for nearly two weeks. We shipped your order yesterday and sincerely apologize for the delay. Below is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047224806406
